Html:
Hello,

I am finetuning my application now. But can't get the marker "on mouseclick" (a downpointing arrow png file) at the right position.

Whatever I fill-in in the offset the marker is never placed in the right position. I have tried different zoomlevels, but that doens't make any diffrence.

The point of the arrow should be my right position (the bottom-center).

 

Any suggestion, idea??

Heru
it depends how you draw the marker, check red rect demo
